skills.name: Thwack
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 100% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Sheathed Blade
skills.simple_desc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and increases SPD.
skills.desc: Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 242% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Butterfly Flurry
skills.simple_desc: Enters the buffed state and deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 425% of her ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Resurgence
skills.simple_desc: Use Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate to defeat enemies, gain extra turns, and enter a buffed state. When in a buffed state, DMG dealt is increased.
skills.desc:
Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 88% for 1 turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

skills.name: Phantom Illusion
skills.simple_desc: Enter Stealth mode. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, enter the buffed state.
skills.desc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

relic_sets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relic_sets.desc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

relic_sets.name: Rutilant Arena
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

skills.name: Beneficent Lotus
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Uses a 2-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 100% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

skills.name: Dracore Libre
skills.simple_desc: Enhances the Basic ATK Beneficent Lotus to Transcendence, Divine Spear, or Fulgurant Leap.
skills.desc:
Enhances Basic ATK. Enhancements may be applied up to 3 times consecutively. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points and is not considered as using a Skill.
Enhanced once, Beneficent Lotus becomes Transcendence.
Enhanced twice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Divine Spear.
Enhanced thrice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Fulgurant Leap.
When using Divine Spear or Fulgurant Leap, starting from the fourth hit, 1 stack of Outroar is gained before every hit. Each stack of Outroar increases Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's CRIT DMG by 12.0%, for a max of 4 stacks. These stacks last until the end of his turn.

skills.name: Azure's Aqua Ablutes All
skills.simple_desc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy, deals Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets, and gains 2 Squama Sacrosancta, which can offset Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's consumption of skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.
skills.desc:
Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 300% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 140% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets. Then, obtains 2 Squama Sacrosancta.
It's possible to hold up to 3 Squama Sacrosancta, which can be used to offset Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's consumption of skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.

skills.name: Righteous Heart
skills.simple_desc: Increases DMG for every hit dealt. This effect is stackable and lasts until the end of this character's turn.
skills.desc: After each hit dealt during an attack, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae gains 1 stack of Righteous Heart, increasing his DMG by 10.0%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s), lasting until the end of his turn.

skills.name: Heaven-Quelling Prismadrakon
skills.simple_desc: Enters the Leaping Dragon state. Attacking will cause this character to move forward rapidly for a set distance and attack all enemies touched. After entering combat via attacking enemies, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.
skills.desc: After using his Technique, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae enters the Leaping Dragon state for 20 seconds. While in the Leaping Dragon state, using his attack enables him to move forward rapidly for a set distance, attacking all enemies he touches and blocking all incoming attacks. After entering combat via attacking enemies in the Leaping Dragon state, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae deals Imaginary DMG equal to 120% of his ATK to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.

skills.name: Transcendence
skills.simple_desc: Unleashes 3 hits in this attack and deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy target.
skills.desc: Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 260% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

skills.name: Divine Spear
skills.simple_desc: Unleashes 5 hits in this attack to deal massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy and minor Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets. For each of the last 2 hits, obtains 1 stack of Outroar just before the hit, increasing CRIT DMG.
skills.desc: Uses a 5-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 380% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deals Imaginary DMG equal to 60% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

skills.name: Fulgurant Leap
skills.simple_desc: Unleashes 7 hits in this attack to deal massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy and Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets. For each of the last 4 hits, obtains 1 stack of Outroar just before the hit, increasing CRIT DMG.
skills.desc: Uses a 7-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 500% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deal Imaginary DMG equal to 180% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

relic_sets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relic_sets.desc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

relic_sets.name: Rutilant Arena
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

skills.name: Mind is Might
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy.
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Dr. Ratio's ATK to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Intellectual Midwifery
skills.simple_desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 150% of Dr. Ratio's ATK to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Syllogistic Paradox
skills.simple_desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy and applies Wiseman's Folly. When Dr. Ratio's allies attack a target afflicted with Wiseman's Folly, Dr. Ratio launches 1 follow-up attack on this target.
skills.desc:
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 216% of Dr. Ratio's ATK to a single target enemy and applies Wiseman's Folly. When Dr. Ratio's allies attack a target afflicted with Wiseman's Folly, Dr. Ratio launches his Talent's follow-up attack for 1 time against this target.
Wiseman's Folly can be triggered for up to 2 times and only affects the most recent target of Dr. Ratio's Ultimate. This trigger count resets after Dr. Ratio's Ultimate is used.

skills.name: Cogito, Ergo Sum
skills.simple_desc: When using the Skill, there is a chance of launching a follow-up attack against the target for 1 time.
skills.desc: When using his Skill, Dr. Ratio has a 40% fixed chance of launching a follow-up attack against his target for 1 time, dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 270% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. For each debuff the target enemy has, the fixed chance of launching follow-up attack increases by 20%. If the target enemy is defeated before the follow-up attack triggers, the follow-up attack will be directed at a single random enemy instead.

skills.name: Mold of Idolatry
skills.simple_desc: Creates a dimension. Enemies within the dimension are Taunted. After entering battle with enemies in this dimension, there is a high chance to reduce SPD of enemy targets.
skills.desc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that Taunts nearby enemies, lasting for 10 second(s). After entering battle with enemies in this dimension, there is a 100% base chance to reduce each single enemy target's SPD by 15% for 2 turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

relic_sets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relic_sets.desc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

relic_sets.name: Inert Salsotto
relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.
